website_summaries.verdict: Smati makes a cute, lightweight umbrella.
pros: The cat design is quite charming
The ribs are made from plastic, which means they won't rust
This umbrella is designed to open one-handed, which is a pretty cool feature
cons: Plastic ribs aren't the best quality, may not hold up in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: No particularly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design of this umbrella and really wanted to get a lot of use out of it. I used it maybe 3 times before the inside spires started warping and became very hard to close. I’m typically closing and opening my umbrella often as I live in New York and travel on foot. I really wanted to love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome see through umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is not only functional, it’s incredibly cute! I love the large size, and that I can be “inside” the dome, which keeps me dry, and keeps rain spatter off my eyeglasses, I can actually see through the dome as I’m walking. The two cute black cats just make it more fun! I may need to get another one to give as a gift and put a smile on someone else’s face!
customer_reviews.author: Mocha Maniac

customer_reviews.title: Cute, lots of compliments, let it dry open!
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella, but a word of warning: dry it open in between uses. I closed up a wet one, and when I next went to open it it was all stuck together and bent the metal umbrella and tore some of it away from the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Black cats...
customer_reviews.text: I have two black cats; this was the perfect choice for a bubble umbrella and I had a bubble umbrella from the 70s. I know how to actually use one to keep my head and shoulders dry!
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: my daughter likes the look of the cat which is very cute but this is best for an adult not an eight year old
customer_reviews.text: No way this is for a kid. Bought it for my daughter based on the title but this is a very large umbrella. Also the material will not last long at all. Already opened it, my daughter likes the look of the cat which is very cute but this is best for an adult not an eight year old.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella for my 6yr old son who loves all things cat. Right away the caps that keep the cover on the spokes come off when the umbrella is closed, and the spokes slide around inside the cover so it loses it's dome shape. Then, the third time we used it, my son found a hole in the plastic, and I know we didn't do anything that would have caused that. It's worthless - a total waste of money, and now my kid is really disappointed. Don't buy this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: citymomnyc

customer_reviews.title: Love, but plastic does not seem super durable
customer_reviews.text: Love, but plastic does not seem super durable. We'll be careful, because we love the kitties and daughter really appreciates the dome- best shape of umbrella to really keep her & backpack dry.
customer_reviews.author: EDW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a cat loving friend for her birthday. She’s obsessed with it. She told me she now looks forward to rainy days! As a side note, she told me people have stopped her in the street asking where she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty9

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella. I'd been wanting a clear dome one for quite some time, but with the adorable trim this one really caught my eye! I've used it twice now and it has done the job of keeping me dry. The plastic is a little thinner/flimsier than I had hoped, so I don't know how well it will hold up long term. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bretagne

customer_reviews.title: It’s more of a novelty. You can get a sturdier umbrella for the same price
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool. Cheap umbrella. The material is flimsy. The umbrella will only cover one person.
customer_reviews.author: Psilo

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Great Fun Umbrella! I purchased two to give as gifts. And they were perfect gifts! If it is going to rain, you may as well have some fun with this umbrella! And the mechanics of it work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: lauralovesbooks

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worthy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I ordered this despite all the negative reviews, the product is low quality, is really thin material, very cute, but I use public transportation this will not do on a rainy day. I would not suggest the purchase Of this product. It is not worth the $23 plus tax. I have Return this for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea...HORRIFIC end product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even used this in the rain yet but it is so cheap looking with random plastic hanging off of it...it just looks sad. Like a kindergarten project gone awry. Literally, looks like someone black out drunk wrapped some saran wrap around the 'skeleton' of the umbrella...the picture of this alleged umbrella is cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! Not only is it the cutest umbrella I've ever seen, but it's durable! I love the dome shape because I have to worry less about my hair and makeup in the rain. So worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and functional. I was surprised by the design and quality. Definitely a good value for money. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend for christmas. She loves it. We gave had so much rain lately. So she has been using it and she is always thanking me.
customer_reviews.author: ANN LEVEILLE

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The moment I took the umbrella out of the box and opened it, the button/snap closure that wraps around the umbrella tore off as I was opening it. Flimsy. However, my daughter LOVES the actual umbrella, so I have given it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: CamiRose

customer_reviews.title: it opens very easy and keeps me nice and dry
customer_reviews.text: I just used my new umbrella today,it opens very easy and keeps me nice and dry. I am pleased with the quality and the cats are very cute! People smile at it even though it's pouring out and it makes me enjoy a rainy day by using it on my way to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old loved it. It wasn't to big for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for JUST RAIN ONLY, not small gusts of wind
customer_reviews.text: Cute umbrella, does really great with rain. But even a small gust of wind made me feel like it was going to turn inside out and break. I was so excited to get a dome umbrella finally, but if it's raining and a little windy then I can't use it. I've only used it one day so far, and for the price that it is, it doesn't seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a Windy City so this is the perfect umbrella. It does not flip like normal umbrellas do. I have gotten a lot of compliments on it. Its a bit flimsy, but it has not flipped on me and that is what I was looking for! Great for people who live in a Windy City and are tired of umbrellas flipping while trying to walk!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Protects
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this umbrella is so stinking cute. I love how it drapes over me. I love that I can see through it. It feels like I’m in a fort, lol. It protects well. I don’t think it’s hard to close at all. It wraps nice with its Velcro tab. Lots of compliments. Bring on the rain!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin K. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Most important thing for me was the cost, durability of the product & the appreciation of the gift and I was pleased about all
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was for one of my daughters who LOVES her cat. So now she can go anywhere when it rains and still think of her cat at home
customer_reviews.author: Delareen

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I used it 😒
customer_reviews.text: Was so exited when I got the umbrella ☔️ but it broke the first time that I used The look of the umbrella 🌂 is really pretty but I wish it didn’t break right away ;(((
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than promised and just in time for rainstorm. My 10-year old daughter loves it. It feels well-made and durable with thick clear plastic. Though we just received it and only used it once, it should last a long time. NOT your typical cheap-o umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Barton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got my nieces each one for Easter and they love them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter because she has 2 black cats and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: watashinoreview

customer_reviews.title: Sad inconvenience but I was able to look at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, got a full refund. Sad inconvenience but I was able to look at the umbrella before returning and it looked cheap anyways. Very thin material, looked like some heavy rain can tear it apart. Also very small. Fine for me, but I'm 5 feet tall 100 lbs so pretty much only suitable for smaller people.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this now! It is fantastic. I love it and it work great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: It's also pretty durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old niece and she loves it! She even insists on walking to school in the rain just so she can use it and show it off. It's also pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice to not have to tip an umbrella "down" to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works well. Nice to not have to tip an umbrella "down" to look for passing traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Constance M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella, it's so cute! The flower pattern is adorable against the clear bubble design.
customer_reviews.author: Vashti Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really cute. Really flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and deep umbrella. Comes apart frequently and must be put back together.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: So very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchildren and they were a HUGE HIT! I had one myself when I was their age. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue from Boston

customer_reviews.title: Kitty’s watching it Rain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. Hopefully the recipient likes it as much as I did. With the rain we are having it should come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Skold

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella! It’s so cute and I love having a clear umbrella so there is more coverage when walking through the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Kapowski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and super cute design. Easy to open and close. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy (MI)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the automatic open feature. Opening is big enough for a female to use with no space restriction problems.
customer_reviews.author: JDLopez16

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but feels pretty flimsy. Might not last long.
customer_reviews.author: S&J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected and keeps you dry in a down pour.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cat Lovers
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was a gift for a Friend who has 12 Cat. Oh such a perfect gift. She loves it as much as the Watermelon umbrella I purchased for myself
customer_reviews.author: MarymomAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my umbrella. It is stinkin’ cute and the shape is great.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love the umbrella - auto open and easy to close for my 91-year-old mother!
customer_reviews.author: mckymaniac

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the person who is getting this will love it. She requested it on her Christmas list
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for Christmas. I'm sure the person who is getting this will love it. She requested it on her Christmas list.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky W.

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Umbrella - Gifts for all
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Gifts for my daughters. Who knew bubble umbrella would be so popular this season?
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Verastegui

customer_reviews.title: Clear Umbrella w/print
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't used the umbrella yet, it looks exactly like the picture and feels sturdy. So far I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: lisa brown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too short for me and I still manage to get a little wet. I('m 5'4)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute design. It is lightweight. I'd prefer a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute design. It is lightweight. I'd prefer a slightly sturdier build, but this is more about fashion in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Netties

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Made very cheap. Super flimsy and broke at first sight of wind. Poor quality. No recommended, even for as cute as it is.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered bent, but the tube it was delivered in was fine, so it was packaged broken and sent anyways
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: You'll be happy that you did
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest umbrella that I've ever owned. I've received a ton of compliments on it. Buy it! You'll be happy that you did!
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after one use. I'm very upset that this happened outside of the refund window.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kern

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: The package was only mildly damaged, but the umbrella stalk was bent and the plastic sheet is very flimsy as well. Was disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: subashinee

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, very big and comes down longer than other umbrellas!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Don't but it!! not worth it! Not even an one time use! It will break down befor u use it!
customer_reviews.text: The first time in my life writing an review! The worse product ever!!! Don't buy it!!! terrible quality! Even the $2 dollars black umbrella sell on the street is better then this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this to give as a Christmas gift. It arrived promptly and was just what I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not done shape
customer_reviews.text: Mine was described as dome however it was not and is just a regular umbrella
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor quality, metal pieces keep popping out of plastic pieces at the bottom. Bummed, but really cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Corbyn Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and I'm a fan of the dome style
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and I'm a fan of the dome style, but the material it is made of is just too thin for my comfort level. It seems like it could tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I’ve been using this for a few months. Everyone comments on it. I tell them where to get it . Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast but was cute
customer_reviews.text: Was cute and my daughter loved it but it broke opening it like the second time she used it
customer_reviews.author: Janna Peruta

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing item I've bought on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Vey poor quality. The spines come out of the tips leaving the umbrella flat and one of them is missing alltogether. The plastic material is flimsy. Went back to using our old umbrella. Going to trash it. Thought I was getting something fun and whimsical for my daughter on rainy days... Disappointing 👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Excellent quality. It's a very cute umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth $17.90. I didn't read the reviews before purchasing this because I thought it was so cute. What other reviews said about the quality and material are true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella arrived and looks beautiful, but it is too delicate
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella arrived and looks beautiful, but it is too delicate. The wires are too weak and it broke the first day I took it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pandey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality but very cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute umbrella. Sadly, on the first use the endcaps that keep the umbrella on and taunt coming off the end of the spines. It's easy to pop them back on. But frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: csc

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very functional
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it was in a torrential Florida rain, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: D ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable with a flawed design
customer_reviews.text: Cute, my daughter loves it - BUT the tines constantly fall out of their holes in the plastic. They can be put back, but it is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Cat umbrellas??? Ummm...YES PLEASE!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so cute! Very sleek and sturdy! It holds up great and really keeps me dryer than regular style umbrellas. Hope they come out with more cat designs!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I felt that for the price. The plastic was very cheap/thin
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen clevenger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: At the first use it broke... cheap material 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Piano

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plastic very thin and pegs kept falling off rods everytime i close umbrella
customer_reviews.author: jcarrelli

customer_reviews.title: Fun Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! The autimatic button made it so easy for my kids to open the umbrella. Great for the price. 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Le Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great, charming gift.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable for cat lovers. It is unique, charming, and a GREAT gift for feline fanciers. It is practical and amusing. There is on for dog lovers too. Don't forget to buy one for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Julia's Disciple

customer_reviews.title: Very cute umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is adorable! My husband bought it for me as a Christmas gift. My only complaint about it is that the plastic tips occasionally detach from the metal frame. It's very easy to put it back together, but no way for a permanent fix.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than the last one I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I like it better than the last one I ordered. It's light and it opens automatically. The other bubble is tricky, so you might get wet before getting it opened. I think the last bubble I ordered would be ideal for a man.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and can easily fit two people under it
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so cute! It is very sturdy and can easily fit two people under it. I like the dome shape as I live in an area that is very windy and I don't see this umbrella doing the inside-out thing in the wind that I hate!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mac

customer_reviews.title: Meow that'a a cute umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift from Papaw to grandkid. She needed an umbrella that kept her backpack dry. Voila! AND there are cats on it and oh so fashionable for a middle schooler. Tre chic!
customer_reviews.author: SSR Mama

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so adorable. Our fifteen year old loves that she can pull it down over her long hair and still see out of the plastic. It is durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Klav

customer_reviews.title: My daughter who is 9 loved this! It's a great size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 9 loved this! It's a great size, plenty big enough for adults. Her grandma and my 30 yr old sister want one now. 😊
customer_reviews.author: shalma

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: The spines come out of the tips everytime we try to use it. Is this a design or remanufacturing flaw? Very poor quality. Returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: its perfect. Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing I've bought in awhile! its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy product. Dome design and clear view make great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SMATI Stick Clear Bubble Umbrella (The Enhanced Edition Cat and Dog) - Auto Open - for Women and Kids
feature_bullets: The Enhanced Edition Cat bubble transparent Resistant to wind Fashionable bubble shape to cover head and shoulders
Extra strong 8 fibreglass frame and ribs, Rubber handle
Clear Fabrics : POE,Transparent cover offers fantastic coverage and visibility
Weight : 375g/0.83lb Measures 33 inches (85cm) long and 33 inches (85cm) in diameter when open.
Umbrella Republic is the exclusive seller of SMATI in USA.If anything goes wrong with your umbrella,Just Return it, And we'll refund it with Amazons Return Policy.
